author: cherry c
title: good stay
text: the overall experience was good, room is clean and comfy. Price was pretty good. But, when I left in the morning, I gave the room key back and was about to leave when a pretty rude and upset british man started to get upset at me, telling me to stay and wait, because if I haven't paid for the taxe de s√©jour, he will have to pay it for me. I didn't know this wasn't paid for, and I think it wasn't a reason to be rude.
